group_1.narration: After that, I began to think about @what I could do for the happiness @of those who came to Mikazuki every day.

group_1.textCenter: I had a fight with my dad...

group_1.narration: There were so many girls who ran away @from home like Nayuta and Yuna.

group_1.textCenter: I was sick of my grandfather meddling around @in my life, so I came here from Yukuni...

group_1.narration: Sometimes we had visitors @who came from far away...

group_1.textCenter: Until they accept Miss K's marriage,

group_1.narration: Many girls with all sorts of problems came to me.

group_1.textRight: My parents have zero understanding @of my fashion sense...!
Like, check this out, this is one of my designs!

group_1.textLeft: Um... Maybe asking your parents for their @opinion would be a good idea, actually...?

group_1.narration: I don't know how word spread, @but we've become more of a @counseling center than a refuge.

group_1.textLeft: I've already gotten some requests to help people @with their troubles...

group_1.textRight: Day in and day out, I find no troubles in my life, @and it's left me without stimulation...

group_1.textCenter: Oh, in that case, there's someone I'd like @to introduce you to...!

group_1.narration: And that might've led to some girls to come here@in hopes they'd make some friends...

group_1.textLeft: I'm looking for a friend who I can gush about @swords with...

group_1.textRight: I used to work at an art museum, but I had some, @erm, interpersonal issues, you could say...
I just can't tell how the guy I love feels @about me!

group_1.textLeft: Erm...maybe you could just...ask? @Would that be too direct...?

group_1.textRight: Asking, huh... If I look at it as just asking, @and not as a confession...
Well, my heart might explode in the process, @but I might be able to pull through!

group_1.narration: I met many different people, @and spoke about many things.@ It was nice to see people leaving @with smiles on their faces.
Most of the time, all I do is listen. @When I consider everything I could be doing, @maybe I'm not being all that helpful...
But for the time being, I just have to focus @on what I can do right now, bit by bit. @It’s left me with no regrets.
Then at one point, after seeing everyone @looking so happy, I had an idea.

group_1.textLeft: You want to borrow a camera?
Oh, yes, I have an old one in storage.
But why do you need a camera all of a sudden?

group_1.textRight: Well, I wanted to take a picture @of everyone's smiles.

group_1.narration: After meeting Ryo at the maid cafe, @she's been sending me photos now and then.
They're almost always blurry, @but they're full of smiles and happiness, @and I looked forward to seeing them.
Ever since I came to Kamihama, @I've experienced joys and sorrows, @learned the value of everyday life, and realized @the things I took for granted aren't a given...
I wanted to preserve these precious, @fleeting moments in photos.

group_1.textCenter: Alright, everyone, please line up for the photo!

group_1.textRight: Maybe try coming a little more this way, Ui.

group_1.textLeft: Just in time! Come join us, Karin.

group_1.textRight: I have no idea what's going on, but sure!

group_1.textCenter: Hiya! I've got a free coupon for you!
Huh? You guys're having a photoshoot?@[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]Count me in!

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* Alright, everyone, let's squeeze @in the middle together!

group_1.narration: *Squeeze*
"Say cheese!"
[flashEffect:flashWhite][surround:7023_camera]*Ker-chak*

group_1.textLeft: How does it look? Did we get it right?

group_1.textRight: Looks like you need some training! Yep yep!
But it's still a great picture. We look so happy!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* Yes, we'll hang it by the entrance!

group_1.textRight: Y-you can't do that! That's embarrassing...!

group_1.narration: After that one class we had, @I think I had interpreted "true happiness" @as being a single, perfect form of happiness...
But I know now that happiness comes @in many different shapes. @You don't have to whittle it down @to just one thing.
As long as we keep having days like these, @that's all that matters.
Maybe the Magical Girl in Karin's story was fighting @to protect an everyday life like this?

group_1.textRight: Now let's take a picture with Iroha this time!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, if we're going to be using this to decorate, shouldn't all of us be in it?

group_1.narration: I wish this happiness would last forever.
